groups.name: spring.python.executor.rest
groups.description: Configuration properties for the REST-based Python executor.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.rest.host
properties.description: Base host URL of the REST Python executor service.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.rest.port
properties.description: Port number used to connect to the REST Python executor service.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.rest.token
properties.description: Authentication token for securing REST requests to the Python executor.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.rest.uri
properties.description: Full URI composed of host and port, pointing to the '/script' REST endpoint.
